name: Iron Ore
description: A common piece of unrefined iron ore, useful for basic smithing.

name: Arcane Dust
description: Fine, shimmering dust with latent magical properties.

name: Emberbloom Petal
description: A fiery red petal that hums with warmth, often used in fire-related concoctions.

name: Shadowsilk Thread
description: A strand of silk spun by shadow spiders, surprisingly durable and infused with faint dark energies.

name: Crystal Shard
description: A sharp fragment of a larger crystal, resonating with a faint energy.

name: Verdant Leaf
description: A vibrant green leaf, pulsing with natural life energy. Commonly used in healing balms.

name: Mystic Orb
description: A small, swirling orb of condensed magical energy. A potent but unstable crafting component.

name: Ancient Bone
description: A fragment of bone from a long-dead creature, brittle but imbued with echoes of the past.

name: Healing Herb
description: A common medicinal herb with natural healing properties.

name: Minor Crystal Shard
description: A small crystal fragment with weak magical resonance.

name: Iron Ore
description: Raw iron ore ready for smelting and forging.

name: Emberbloom Petal
description: A fiery petal that radiates warmth and magical energy.

name: Crystal Shard
description: A refined crystal fragment with stable magical properties.

name: Arcane Dust
description: Finely ground magical dust with potent enchanting properties.

name: Mystic Orb Fragment
description: A piece of a shattered mystic orb, still containing concentrated magical energy.

name: Leather Hide
description: Tough animal hide suitable for crafting armor and protective gear.

name: Shadowsilk Thread
description: Rare thread spun by shadow creatures, incredibly strong and magically conductive.

name: Ancient Bone
description: Bone from an ancient creature, imbued with residual magical energy.
